overview: Ken is responsible for technology strategy and implementation at MyNewPlace. Ken is a veteran of the apartment rental space having worked as the Director of Software Development at AllApartments/SpringStreet where he managed all site design and development activities. Prior to SpringStreet, Ken was a Software Architect and Development Manager for Biosym Technologies (now Accelrys), a San Diego based developer of molecular modeling and drug design software. Ken holds a B.A. in Computer Science from the University of California, San Diego and an M.S. in Computer Science from the University of California, Santa Cruz.
